content: Experience all the magic of the wizardry world when you begin reading the Harry Potter pop-up book. This brilliantly illustrated book provides a detailed account of the perilous adventures Harry Potter and the gang encounter through their studies at Hogwarts.

Transform your backyard pool into the summertime hangout spot with the inflatable floating movie screen. Once inflated, the screen measures 7′ and provides a premiere entertainment spot for family and friends to enjoy without succumbing to the brutal heat.

Unlike those needy dogs, cats don’t rely on their masters in order to get some cardio. The cat exercise wheel allows you to make sure your feline friend stays in top form and gets in a good cardio workout within the comfort of home and without you pestering it with a leash.

If Homer Simpson was real, he would exclusively use the the donut usb to save all his important documents from the nuclear plant. The mouth watering exterior boasts 4GB of storage capacity and is small enough to fit comfortably in your pocket or purse.

If you don’t want to take your kid to the park or want to beat the outdoor heat, the indoor door frame swing is the answer to your prayers. It can be set up on most door frames to provide your kid with hours of safe entertainment while you enjoy the perks of staying indoors.

Your betta fish will feel like a big shot in a high rise penthouse when you move him into the wall mounted fish bowl. Apart from giving your pet a lavish view, the fish bowl brings a stylish touch to the room and makes for a great conversation piece as well.

Take drinking responsibly to a whole new level with the calorie counting wine glass – with each pour you’ll be able to <del>guilt trip yourself</del> determine how many belly bloating calories you’ll be consuming so you can stay faithful to the diet you just started two days ago.

Men can be real jerks. If you want a responsible and loving man you have to make him yourself – better yet – knit him yourself. The knitted boyfriend will never cheat on you, choose his sock puppet friends over you, or refuse to cuddle when you’re feeling down.

Keep your laptop’s keyboard as clean and pristine as the day you bought it with help from the MacBook keyboard cover. The cover is transparent enough for the backlit keys to shine through and durable enough to withstand many washes.

Once the zombies rise up, things like the forearm ammo sleeve will become as vital to your survival as water. Great for hunting and shooting, the sleeve accommodates up to eight shells in 1″ elastic bands so they’re always at hand for quick reloading.

A delicious catch is always guaranteed when casting off with the campfire fishing pole. This creative and fun fishing pole is built with a specialized hook designed so you can cook marshmallows or hot dogs to flame-broiled perfection over a campfire.

Whether the goal is getting your memo noticed among all the others or to create a unique accent light, the push pin lights will help you get the job done. Their unique  design includes a tip you can activate at the push of a button to emit a bright and colorful glow.

Light up your soulmate’s day by giving her what she’s always wanted, the diamond ring lamp. This monstrous 10 karat diamond features a custom monogrammed message that appears when the light comes on to remind your sweatheart how much you love her.

No serious drinker or boozehound should be without the drop catch magnetic bottle opener in their home. It installs on the wall for easy access and features a magnetized wooden backboard to immediately catch falling bottle caps.

Make your love of the sea known with a paperweight that has personality, stinging power, and glow-in-the-dark properties. The jellyfish paperweight will be the eye-catcher of your sea-themed office and will keep papers down when there’s a storm a-brewin.

Sprinkle some <del>cavity causing</del> magic onto your munchies and give them that mythical touch for extra flavor and aesthetics. Each magical unicorn comes with a vibrant rainbow mane and offers a fun way to add the perfect garnish to your sugary treats.

Don’t let Grumpy Cat’s disgruntled look deter  your cuddly advances. Even though this soft plushie will loathe every hug and kiss you give it, you can count on him always being there for you through the good times – and his personal favorite – the bad times.

With the chocolate popsicle USB drive not even class or work will get in between you and a little frozen treat. The design conceals the USB within a tasty chocolate covered exterior that provides 4GB of storage space and a handy chain for convenient transport.

Defend your honor, family, and most importantly your outfit  from the rain with the samurai sword umbrella safely in your kung-fu grip. The umbrella boasts a long Japanese sword handle to improve handling and comes with a cool sheath for convenient transport.

Add a splash of quirkiness to bath time with the drowning hand sink plug. This comical rubber made sink plug comes in a variety of eye-catching colors and effectively keeps the sink plugged while a tiny drowning hand above calls out for help.

Never feel alone or cold again as long as you happen to be wearing the Hangover baby hoodie. This hilarious novelty hoodie features an awesome picture of Carlos the baby, as he chills in this baby Bjorn rocking his shades and keeping you company.

Buddha, perhaps no stranger himself to the pleasures of butter fat, can bring nirvana to your finest Kerry Gold butter. Even though he is above the desires for worldly goods and pleasures, he doesn’t judge you when you go for that extra tab. That’s true enlightenment.

Ensure your furry friend remains fully hydrated during the brutal summer heat with the automatic dog drinking fountain. Once installed, the fountain employs a sonar proximity sensor that automatically detects when your pooch is nearby to provide clean drinking water.

Our favorite hero/talk show host of the 90s is finally available in action figure form and we couldn’t be happier. Whether the mission is saving the galaxy or in-depth interviews of your other action figures, the Space Ghost action figure is sure to rise up to the challenge.

With the multi-port USB car charger on the next road trip, both you and your co-pilot will be able to stay connected while your mobile devices charge simultaneously. The universal charger works on a  variety of devices while the innovative “Y” shape keeps cables untangled.

The beer bottle icicle is the ultimate  way to keep your favorite brew icy cold long after you remove it from the fridge or cooler. The icicle screws on to the top of the bottle and runs the entire length of the bottle to efficiently chill your drink without watering it down.

Cut the cost of your monthly electrical bill by plugging your appliances into the smart chip surge protector. The surge protector includes 10 separate outlets and automatically powers down when the appliances are off in order reduce on overall energy usage.

Complete your killer look with a fashion accessory that’s to die for with the butcher’s cleaver purse. The purse lets you store all your personal belongings within the blood covered cleaver blade and provides a comfortable strap and handle combo for carrying it around.

Cowabunga! With the Teenage Mutang Ninja Turtles hoodie you can now fight crime, hang out in disgusting sewers, and roll around in toxic green waste in convincing fashion. Each hoodie features an eye mask and is available in all of the Ninja Turtle styles.

Wondering if the new house you just moved into was built on an Indian burial ground? There’s an app for that – introducing the iPhone ghost detector. This trusty tool helps detect electromagnetic radiation so you know if any ghosts happen to be lingering around.

Let out your repressed white collar rage while staying organized with these middle finger paperclips. Whether you want to say “fuck you” to the actual documents, or the intended recipients, the middle finger paperclips are great for blowing off some steam in the office.

Piss off your fellow drivers as you cut them off then flash them the grumpy cat car decal while speeding off into the distance. Made to endure rough outdoor conditions, the decal applies easily on smooth surfaces and offers a <del>howdy doody</del> middle finger to motorists.

No other toy gun will kill time quite like the vapor blaster. This handheld blaster fires perfectly formed odorless vapor smoke rings at distances up to fourteen feet. It’s fun for all ages and great for playing at home or getting through the dull day.

Two of man’s greatest passions combine in the extremely appealing bikini beer mugs. With a tantalizing shape and stylish bikini available in two colors, these full bodied mugs are the ideal way to hold up to half a liter of your favorite beer.

Express your emotions without saying a single word. The wiggly cat ears use specialized sensors to read your brainwaves and move the ears accordingly so if you’re feeling sad they fold down, and perk up when you get excited or happy.

Let your muscles do all the talking – with the gesture control armband you’ll be one step closer to blowing shit up with your mind. The armband listens to the electrical activity in your arm caused from various hand movements to wirelessly control digital technologies.

I am the one that bobbles! Now you can show off your favorite cancer ridden high school chemistry teacher turned crystal meth kingpin with this Heisenberg bobblehead. Mr. White might not live much longer, but his head will forever bobble on in our hearts.

Make any dull room come to life by hanging up the chalkboard wall planter. This unique planter hangs vertically and comes with 10 cells so you can grow a multitude of greenery in a confined space. A handy chalkboard frame allows you to label and keep track of what you plant.

There’s nothing better than a good ol’ pretzel on a summer day – especially when it helps you cool off like the pretzel pool float. This over sized pretzel requires no salt or mustard and provides an excellent spot for you and a friend to relax and beat the heat.

What has Patrick so surprised — Have they stopped selling those delectable Krabby Patties? The surprised Patrick shirt portrays our favorite starfish with an expression of awe so outlandishly funny it’ll crack up anyone around whether they’re Spongebob fans or not.

Enjoy a majestic nighttime sky even if smog or light pollution have overshadowed the actual sky above with the starry night projector. It projects 360 degrees of jaw dropping visuals ideal for introducing kids to astronomy or creating a romantic mood for an intimate date.

Combine lunchtime with playtime when you prepare your kids a tasty sandwich using the tetris sandwich mold. This amusing mold splits the sandwich into several tetris pieces that make it easier to eat as well as fun to play with when mom isn’t looking.

Wield the deadliest weapon in the entire utility belt when you start carrying around the Batman batarang knife. Equipped with dual three inch stainless steel blades, the knife takes a familiar bat shape and provides twice the cutting power once extended.

The light up charging cable adds a fun spin to charging your electronic devices by containing a unique design that simulates the flow of electricity running from the laptop to the mp3 player. Apart from the visual stimulation, it comes in as a handy nightlight as well.

With the floating card table you and friends can enjoy a rousing game of poker as you cool off in the middle of the pool. The table features an inflatable bumper that keeps the table afloat while it ensures the water stays out so the playing surface remains dry.

Add some whimsy to tea time with the stacked mugs ceramic mug. Made to look like three stacked teacups, this mug lets you hold up to 12 oz of your chosen beverage and offers you three different places to hold the ceramic mug from.

Powerful forces combine on this keyboard cat shirt. Focusing the raw energy of the three wolf moon shirt with the infamous keyboard cat, the lint wads from this omnipotent shirt are said to be key ingredients in a powerful elixir that creates internet superstardom.

It’s that time of the month again – time to get drunk! With these tampon flasks you can discretely sneak alcohol into just about anywhere and no security guard in their right mind would dare question it unless they’ve got some kind of weird tampon inspecting fetish.

The glowing memo alarm clock is the ultimate nightstand addition. Apart from the alarm and clock combo, this unique model includes a specialized glowing memo board and four USB ports located at the back so you can charge all your devices at once.

With versatility that rivals duct tape, the reusable zip ties are the household item you never knew you needed. Whether you need to tie a bag or bind objects together or organize cables, there’s no job they can’t preform – it’s rubber bands for the 21st century.

You already think that your baby resembles a delicious snack, so put on these fortune cookie slippers to seal the deal visually. These adorably designed fleece slippers are great for toddlers and babies alike, with grip on the bottom for early walkers.

See the world through the scope of an ace hitman without having to deal with the guilty conscience of sniping someone afterwards. The sniper rifle peephole decal creates the illusion you’re getting ready to take aim when you look to see pesky solicitors at the door.

The giant dog tongue chew toy is the ultimate pet toy. It’s made from non-toxic solid natural rubber and contains a ball and tongue combo great for playing fetch, posing for hilarious pictures or cracking people up on the street as you and your loyal companion pass them by.

Use the force and help yourself achieve that Colgate smile by brushing with the toothbrush lightsaber. The fine bristles get in between teeth to fight tarter and plaque with Jedi-like precision. It’s the easy way to get your young Padawan to brush his/her teeth without fuss.

Construct the Imperial Army’s greatest weapon ever when you take on the challenge of building the LEGO Death Star. The iconic moon-like planet destroying space station is now in LEGO form, just waiting for some <del>rebel scum to blow it up</del> person to step on it.

Whether you’re looking to do demolition work on your home, or want a reliable weapon for surviving the violent zombie apocalypse, the unbreakable sledge hammer will easily be the tool of choice. You’ll be a one man wrecking machine with this hammer on hand.

Disguise your smartphone as hardware with the hard drive iPhone case. This novelty case fits snugly on the iPhone 5 and protects it from minor falls and scratches while providing your phone with a unique and clever disguise to deter any would be thief.

Peel your favorite fruit like a total pro with the apple peeler machine. Virtually anyone can use this appliance; once the apple is mounted on top, the machine expertly peels the apple skin without wasting any of the good parts so you make the most of your healthy snack.

titleEN: Glow In The Dark Beer Pong
content: Make any party an epic one by setting up a glow in the dark beer pong competition. Now thanks to the neon lit cups, balls and table you’ll be able to add an awesome effect to the most popular drinking game of all time and keep the party going all night long.

Keep your mischievous dog where you can truly keep an eye on him with the doggy high chair, the chair that lets your pooch sit at the table – like he’s people. This chair clips on to most dining room tables, and it really allows your dog to be an integrated family member.

No one likes a dirty broom, so make sure yours is spic and span with the broom-cleaning dustpan. This dustpan has a clever comb which helps comb dirt and debris from your broom, ensuring you’re not just spreading dust around the house.

All puny humans will bow down to the awesome power of your offspring once they put on the Incredible Hulk smash hands. Both monstrous fists are clenched for action and made from a soft material to prevent injury when your kid is in the middle of a rampage.

Show your kids how much you love them by using the bear sandwich mold to make their lunch. Once you press the plastic mold onto the bread, it morphs into a cute and cuddly bear you can decorate with garnishes in order to add a little character to the sandwich.

Mistakes will become something to smile about when using the “oops!” vinyl eraser to correct them. This comical vinyl eraser is perfect for use on all types of paper and leaves the surface smudge free so you can continue working on a clean sheet, free of mistakes.

Anthropomorphize your car with a splash of Pixar magic by using the Cars Lighting McQueen sunshade. The sunshade’s whimsical design displays Lightning McQueen’s captivating baby blue’s as it keeps your car cool and protects the interior from UV rays.

titleEN: Wizard Of Oz Red Slipper Socks
content: Put on these Wizard of Oz red slipper socks after a hard day’s work and get carried away to your own secluded Oz. They’re beautifully crafted with silver and red metallic threads and feature a warm terry cloth weave for unsurpassed comfort.

The skeleton touch screen gloves grant  you the ability to navigate through your smartphone without risking frostbite in cold weather. Apart from the killer skleton design, they feature specially designed fingertips that allow the user to maneuver the touch screen on their phones.

With the door organizer hanging from the knob, you’ll never again fall victim to forgetting your keys or wallet at home. This organizer comes equipped with three separate slots  in addition to a helpful ‘do not forget’ reminder embroidered on the front.

If you enjoy grossing out your co-workers, get the organ transplant lunch bag for carrying around your sack of meat, or whatever you eat for lunch. You can tell your friends that it’s a kidney you’ve got to take to the hospital — and then you got hungry and ate it.

Leave the cages to everyone else — you and your dog will ride on the Harley, but be sure his little eyes are protected with dog goggles. These goggles will not only protect your dog’s eyes but they will also make him up his biker cred. Doggie biker vest not included.

The beaver pencil sharpener will guarantee you’re always equipped with the pointiest writing utensils in the the entire room. With their love for chomping on wood, just a few seconds inside the chrome plated beaver’s mouth is all it’ll take to get the job done.

Even those who are lactose intolerant will be able to enjoy a thick slice of Swiss cheese – as long as they use it to prop open the door. The Swiss cheese door stopper resembles a wedge of tasty cheese that is ideal for holding any door open without leaving scratch marks.

It may not include a sharp saw or screw driver, but the multi-purpose eating utensil will come in more handy than any other pocket knife you’ve ever owned. Equipped with a knife, spoon, and fork, this eating utensil is essential for camping or living as a hobo.

Whether it’s 12 noon or midnight, the wake up nightlight will feel right at home sitting on your night stand. During the day, it slumbers until its arms are flipped upside down, at which point he emits a soft glow that creates a cozy sleeping environment.

Upgrade your iPhone with the latest SmellTime app with this silicone nose iPhone case. Similar in functionality to the iPhone’s FaceTime, SmellTime allows you to wirelessly send smells – such as lovely flowers or dank farts – to any willing recipient.

Protect yourself from the rain in addition to potential attacks that may come your way with the unbreakable umbrella. This unique umbrella is made with sturdy materials that enable it to keep you dry and also double as a self defense weapon.

Abort! Abort! When caught browsing in incognito mode, the sturdy “PANIC” escape key will handle your button smashing with ease. Made in a bright red hue, this replacement key is great for quickly closing out your private windows when unwanted viewers are in range.

The Iron Man USB drive exemplifies how Mr. Stark has designed every part of his technologically superior suit to perform a useful task. Available in two designs, just plug in and watch his eyes glow as he saves all your important documents.

The Adventure Time iPad cover is exactly what you need to augment the iPad’s power. This handmade leather-bound cover is sturdy on the exterior and lined with micro-suede on the inside to provide complete protection from scratches, minor falls and Liches.

The boobs coloring book allows you to stare at magnificent pairs of breasts for hours on end without being called a pervert – in fact, you might even receive artistic praise for it.  You’ll have page after page of busty material so you can color to your hearts content.

Get the ultimate nightstand centerpiece for your room with the mini aquarium clock. This multifaceted appliance is 50% pet, 30% appliance, 20% storage device and 100% useful. It’s the only functioning alarm clock that contains an adjacent LED lit fish tank.

There will be no need to brush up on survival skills before venturing to the great outdoors as long as you make sure to pack the stove in a can – it’ll take care of everything to need to make it through the night – minus providing you with shelter or actual food to cook with.

Plant the seed of knowledge in every book you read by using the sprout bookmark. This creatively designed bookmark is designed to look like a small healthy plant that has begun to grow out of the page in the novel where you last left off.

Maintain thy shopping lists and receipts neat and organized with the royal wax seal magnet. The crimson emblem displays his majesty’s holy crown on the front while concealing a powerful magnet on the back so envelopes and other documents are always at hand.

No day at the beach, pool or on the boat would be complete without <del>a hefty supply of alcohol</del> the waterproof boombox. This sturdy boombox encapsulates your precious iPod in a waterproof compartment that’ll keep it safe and dry as it bumps out your favorite tunes.

Tame the jungle of cables lurking in the back of the desk or entertainment system with the desk cable organizer. This easy to install piece is great for keeping your work-space tidy and all the cables you regularly use organized and easily at hand.

Make the sometimes tedious and monotonous task of cooking a bit more fun with the panda skillet. Lined with a quality non-stick coating, the pan features an adorable panda decal over the exterior of the pan capable of placing a smile on any chef’s face.

Orale ese, add a splash of citrus to almost any bottled beverage with the sombrero citrus juicer. The juicer’s nozzle fits over most bottles so you can squeeze the fruit of your choosing and infuse your flavorless drink in a snap without making a mess.

Forget about wearing those embarrassing and uncomfortable money pouches and fanny packs, only the pocketed underwear will truly keep your valuables safe and in place while travelling – it also works great for stashing all your important documents.

Lazyness and deliciousness collide when you use this amazing chocolate milk mixer mug to craft your favorite drinks. This nifty mug allows you to mix your favorite teeth rotting ingredients with just the push of a button! It’s like a mini-blender you can drink out of!

Brighten up any gloomy and/or rainy day with the color changing umbrella. Apart from keeping you nice and dry during storms, the fun water droplet design emblazoned on the umbrella changes from white to rainbow colored when it gets wet.

Practice your Jedi mind tricks with this Star Wars Force trainer. Using nothing more than your deeply focused mind you will be able to control the training ball inside the device. With enough practice, you’ll even be able to shoot Force choke your enemies.

Now with the princess dress blanket, there’ll be no need for a fairy god mother if your little girl wants to look and feel like royalty. This lovely duvet features a regal and elegant dress emblazoned over the front and is complimented by a tiara pillow case.

Make sure to bring the jumbo poker chips to game night when you and your friends play using the giant playing cards. This enormous deck contains all the standard cards, just blown up 8X larger. No matter what game you play, this deck is guaranteed to increase the fun.

Drop off the frighteningly realistic Left 4 Dead Boomer figurine in your home and watch as he infects the Barbies and G.I. Joes. The Boomer figurine is seven inches tall and as full of rage as ever; his guts burble and are detachable, and his belly hangs out gloriously.

Step into the future of physical training with the virtual fighting fitness game. This high-tech game comes equipped with a central monitor in addition to five strategically placed smaller pads designed to mimic realistic situations in order to get you into top fighting shape.

Stay visible on your nightly run and avoid those dangerous encounters with cars with the night time visibility vest. Featuring an ultra bright and lightweight material made to endure all kinds of weather conditions, so no matter where you are, you’ll be able to do so safely.

Make brushing your teeth a fun activity with the cat puke toothpaste dispenser. Great for cat lovers, this charismatic feline gives the toothbrush a nice thick and healthy coat of plaque fighting toothpaste so your teeth and breathe remain clean and fresh.

Get ready for the ultimate lounging experience — this inflatable sofa combines pool lounging with couch lounging. Slap on some sunscreen, turn up your headphones, and get your tanning and napping gears ready to grind. A perfect accessory for the professional lounger.

Parents raising infants can now make their lives a whole lot easier using the flower baby bath seat. This adorably designed seat is the cuter alternative to a regular baby tub; its unique flower shape cradles your little bundle of joy so they remain comfy during bath time.
